Class Gameplay

java.lang.Object
src.Pages.Gameplay.Gameplay
public class Gameplay extends Object
The Gameplay classes is the gameplay of the entire game where the user interacts with the pet.

The gameplay consists of the user interacting with their pet by feeding and playing with the pet, taking them to the vet, giving them gifts, etc. The settings can also be edited inside this window. Health, sleep, hunger, and happiness values will change depending on how the user treats the pet. The score increases the more the user treats the pet well

  • Constructor Details

    • Gameplay

      public Gameplay(String filename)
      Creates the gameplay window and displays all the features on the screen.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file containing the game data

  • Method Details

    • createButtonActionPanel

      public JPanel createButtonActionPanel()
      Creates the button action panel to do the following operations: feed, sleep, gift, vet, play, and open inventory.
      Returns:
      the button action panel

    • refreshButtonPanel

      public void refreshButtonPanel()
      Refreshes the button panel. Usually called when player changes keybindings in settings.

    • updateData

      private void updateData(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonContents, String property, int value)
      Updates the game data and writes it into the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      jsonContents - the JSON object containing the game data
      property - the property to update
      value - the new value of the property

    • checkForScoreReward

      private void checkForScoreReward()
      Checks if the player has reached the score reward threshold and gives a random item if so.

    • giveRandomItem

      private void giveRandomItem()
      Gives a random item to the player as a reward.

    • loadIcon

      private ImageIcon loadIcon(String path, int width, int height)
      Loads an icon from the specified path and resizes it.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the icon
      width - the width of the icon
      height - the height of the icon
      Returns:
      the resized icon

    • createPetGifs

      private void createPetGifs(String petPath, String petEmotion, Dimension screenSize)
      Creates GIFs for the pet and sets their positions into the middle of the screen.
      Parameters:
      petPath - the path to the pet GIF
      petEmotion - the emotion of the pet
      screenSize - the size of the screen

    • updatePetImage

      private void updatePetImage()
      Updates the pet image when called upon.

    • startLimitTimer

      private void startLimitTimer()
      Starts the countdown based on the screen time limit set in the save file. If time runs out, it will automatically close the gameplay window.

    • indicatorLabels

      private JLabel indicatorLabels(String indicator, int value, int isScore)
      Creates a label for the game indicators.
      Parameters:
      indicator - the name of the indicator
      value - the value of the indicator
      isScore - checks if it's the score label. 0 for no, anything else it is
      Returns:
      the indicator label

    • gameButtons

      private JButton gameButtons(String text, String iconPath)
      Creates a game button with the specified label and icon.
      Parameters:
      text - the label of the button
      iconPath - the path to the icon image
      Returns:
      the created JButton

    • closeGameplay

      public void closeGameplay()
      Closes the gameplay window and stops the playtime session and saves the new playtime into it's JSON file

    • saveGameState

      private void saveGameState()
      Saves the current game state to the JSON file associated with the current save slot. This method updates the health, happiness, sleep, fullness, and score values in the JSON file.

    • getPetStates

      private String[] getPetStates()
      Retrieves the current pet states based on its attributes and emotion values.
      Returns:
      an array containing the emotion suffix and pet emotion

    • feedPet

      private void feedPet()
      Feeds the pet and updates the hunger value.

    • putPetToSleep

      private void putPetToSleep(JLabel sleepLabel)
      Puts the pet to sleep and updates the sleep value.
      Parameters:
      sleepLabel - the JLabel displaying the sleep value

    • createMessageLabel

      private JLabel createMessageLabel(String message, Color color)
      Creates a JLabel to display a message with the specified text and background color. The label is positioned at the center of the screen.
      Parameters:
      message - the text to display in the label
      color - the background color of the label
      Returns:
      the created JLabel

    • createNameLabel

      private JLabel createNameLabel(String message)

    • giftPet

      private void giftPet()

    • takePetToVet

      private void takePetToVet(JLabel healthLabel, JLabel happinessLabel)
      Takes the pet to the vet and updates the health and happiness values.
      Parameters:
      healthLabel - the JLabel displaying the health value
      happinessLabel - the JLabel displaying the happiness value

    • playWithPet

      private void playWithPet(JLabel sleepLabel, JLabel happinessLabel)
      Plays with the pet and updates the sleep and happiness values.
      Parameters:
      sleepLabel - the JLabel displaying the sleep value
      happinessLabel - the JLabel displaying the happiness value

    • savePlaytimeToJson

      private void savePlaytimeToJson()
      Saves the playtime data to the JSON file associated with the current save slot. This method updates the total playtime, last playtime, and average playtime in the JSON file.
